articles.title: What's up with WhatsApp? | News - The Guardian
articles.description: A routine update to WhatsApp’s privacy policy resulted in a public relations fiasco earlier this month, when viral posts questioning the changes prompted users to look for alternative apps. Kate O’Flaherty breaks down what’s next for WhatsApp
articles.content:
With a user base of 2 billion people, WhatsApps dominance has long seemed indisputable. But in recent weeks, millions have suddenly flocked to competitors such as Signal and Telegram. 
It all began … [+364 chars]
